God has declared that the seventh day is the Sabbath of the Lord. When "the heavens and the earth were finished," He exalted this day as a memorial of His creative work. Resting on the seventh day "from all his work which he had made, . . . God blessed the seventh day, and sanctified it" (Genesis 2:1-3) (Prophets and Kings, pp. 178-180).
